briefTitle: Evaluation of a New Radiotracer (68Ga-NOTA-AE105) for Diagnosing Aggressive Cancer With Positron Emission Tomography
officialTitle: 68Ga-NOTA-AE105. Evaluation of a New Radiotracer Targeting uPAR (Urokinase Plasminogen Activator Receptor), for Positron Emission Tomography Imaging of the Invasive Cancer Phenotype. First in Human
conditions: Breast Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Urinary Bladder Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. diagnosed with cancer of prostate, breast or urinary bladder
2. capable of understanding and giving full informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

1. pregnancy
2. lactation
3. contraindication for the use of intravenous CT contrast-agencies
4. claustrophobia
